"Central Dome Fire Swirl":
"That emergency broadcast, it mentioned a
\"large scale fire\" on the ARKS Ship...
It reminds me of the day of the Blue Burst.
Can't I be of use here?
Even if I'm going alone, I want to save as
many as I can!
No one's dying in front of me a second time!
I'm heading to the scene! You come too!

※Clear on Normal or higher"
